title: Wrong Data Set Result with Invalid Filter Expression for row[0]
description: When setting a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' or returning a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned when previewing.
EB: The expected result is that the developer mentioned that 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched. Therefore, 'row[0]' can't be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to 0'.
2. Click on the Preview tab.
